title: 服务器总是自己关闭 不知道怎么回事
author: wei_han1
txt_content:
bc群组服  空岛服一天会关闭两次 不知道怎么回事 


[00:08:39] [Craft Scheduler Thread - 577/INFO]: [Metrics] Connection timed out: connect

replies.author: eesy
replies.txt_content:
你服务器设置了自动重启
[00:28:18] [Craft Scheduler Thread - 601/INFO]: [AutoRestart] Server restart in 5 seconds!

replies.author: wei_han1
replies.txt_content:
eesy 发表于 2018-8-20 20:19
你服务器设置了自动重启
[00:28:18] [Craft Scheduler Thread - 601/INFO]: [AutoRestart] Server restart  ...
怎么关掉

replies.author: wei_han1
replies.txt_content:
eesy 发表于 2018-8-20 19:47
你服务器设置了自动重启
[00:28:18] [Craft Scheduler Thread - 601/INFO]: [AutoRestart] Server restart  ...
以最佳 谢谢
[00:28:24] [Craft Scheduler Thread - 607/WARN]: A manual (plugin-induced) save has been detected while server is configured to auto-save. This may affect performance. 这个是原因 WARN 是错误
AutoRestart 中文名叫 自动重启 删掉即可

replies.author: eesy
replies.txt_content:
wei_han1 发表于 2018-8-20 20:24
怎么关掉
你是什么服务器？面板服的话看看你是不是在定时任务里面设置的定时重启
